EmailTemplate.name: Reminder International Week
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder International Week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents,
REMINDER Re: International Week and International Day
A quick reminder, our International Week is to be held during the week beginning 13th March 2017.
Here are the countries :
Americas Europe Asia Chile England Chinese Culture Brazil Spain Korea Columbia Sweden Japan Argentina The Netherlands India Mexico France USA Italy
If you are interested in representing your country, please contact Erika at CF campus (emaceron@gmail.com) or Lyaila at CJ campus (lyaila@hotmail.com) by Wednesday 22nd February (tomorrow).
Kind regards, -- STEVEN SMALL
Head of Primary British College of Brazil
